AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farm child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a peasant family and spent [PAWN_possessive] working on their small plot of farmland.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: noble heir
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the scion of an ancient noble house. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_pronoun] childhood pampered by servants and learning the art of rulership.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wizard's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a local wizard at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned many things during this apprenticeship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: witch's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a local witch at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned many things about headology during this apprenticeship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: crusader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took part in a makeshift crusade by children and peasants to try and retake the holy land of [PAWN_possessive] religion. It was an absolute disaster and many died. The rest were traumatized for life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: blacksmith's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to the town blacksmith for many years. The hard physical labor greatly honed [PAWN_possessive] physique.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: squire
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was squired to a noble knight and aided him in many ways while learning the art of combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: assassin's guild student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in the Assassin's Guild by [PAWN_possessive] family, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to inhume people with style.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: servant's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a pair of servants, and spent [PAWN_possessive] helping them with their tasks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wildling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in the forest with [PAWN_possessive] father, living off the land and shunning organized society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents died when [PAWN_pronoun] was very young. [PAWN_pronoun] had to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own on the dangerous streets of a major city.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: peasant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived the life of a peasant, farming to sustain [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] was looked down on by the other members of [PAWN_possessive] society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: failed wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] attempted to become a wizard but couldn't manage even the simplest spell. Instead [PAWN_pronoun] learned to run from all [PAWN_possessive] problems.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Magic Aztec
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Magic Aztec, and participated in the great campaigns of conquest against Europe thousands of years ago before being put into a highly advanced Aztec cryosleep chamber. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] has ended up stranded on this Rimworld.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a blacksmith, crafting tools and weapons for [PAWN_possessive] community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: lord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medieval lord, ruling over [PAWN_possessive] fiefdom benevolently and thus earning the love of [PAWN_possessive] people.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: baron
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a baron, ruling over [PAWN_possessive] fiefdom with an iron fist and earning the hatred of [PAWN_possessive] subjects.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: knight
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a knight of the realm, serving in multiple campaigns and wars over the years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: crusader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in a crusade for the holy land of [PAWN_possessive] religion, learning the arts of war in the process.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: medieval merchant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a merchant, travelling by caravan from city to city and peddling [PAWN_possessive] goods far and wide.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: jester
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a jester, entertaining [PAWN_possessive] lord with [PAWN_possessive] foolish antics. [PAWN_pronoun] has few actual skills, however...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: sausage salesman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spend [PAWN_possessive] days attempting to peddle sausages in [PAWN_possessive] town's main square. The sausages were universally regarded as vile, but somehow [PAWN_nameDef] managed to get people to buy them anyway...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a librarian at a prestigious wizard school. At one point [PAWN_pronoun] was turned into an orangutan due to a magical accident. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't mind though, and was actually quite angry when, a few years later, [PAWN_possessive] colleagues restored [PAWN_possessive] human form.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: plague victim
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a terrible plague which nearly took [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] was strengthed from the experience in the long run, however, and has a high resistance to disease.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: archchancellor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the archchancellor of a prestigious university. [PAWN_pronoun] had a rather non-standard approach to this, and preferred to intimidate [PAWN_possessive] underlings with a crossbow rather than engage in intellectual pursuits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bursar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the bursar of a university. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] mental instability in this role and required a constant supply of dried frog pills to maintain [PAWN_possessive] sanity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: village witch
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the local witch of a small village. She helped them with their problems using her mastery of headology, as well as a bit of magic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: courtier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a courtier at the local lord's court. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time networking with the other members of the court.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: donkey cart operator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the operator of a donkey cart. For some reason, no one ever seemed to have [PAWN_possessive] number.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: medieval doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor in a medieval town. [PAWN_pronoun] had no idea what the fuck [PAWN_pronoun] was doing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an adventurer, wandering from kingdom to kingdom helping people with their problems and getting paid for it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: tavernkeep
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned the local tavern in [PAWN_possessive] town, and was generally respected by the community. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] tended to get drunk on his own supply.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: poacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in the wilds, poaching on the local lord's land to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assassin for the Assassin's Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] inhumed many with flair and style.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: medieval alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an alchemist who sought without success to turn various materials into gold. [PAWN_pronoun] did manage to learn a lot about making other stuff, however.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: 煉金術士
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] 是一名煉金術士。來自中國。他試圖用主要是水銀為他的皇帝釀造長生不老藥。它沒有用。
